profile.name: Uciel
profile.title: Frontend Engineer
profile.description:
My name is Uciel Sola, and I'm a driven Frontend Developer based in Buenos Aires, Argentina. With a passion for solving problems and a strong foundation in user experience principles, I craft intuitive digital experiences. My expertise includes TypeScript, HTML, CSS, and frameworks like Svelte, React, Vue, and Angular.

At [Viset](https://www.visetlab.com/en), I enhanced the user experience of a mobile app with 200+ daily users, focusing on intuitive navigation and seamless interactions. Additionally, I streamlined internal processes by developing custom admin panels for efficient user and content management.

For [Mercanis](https://mercanis.com), I built client-tailored software solutions, prioritizing user-friendly interfaces for improved adoption and efficiency. I collaborated with product designers to define and implement new features based on user feedback, and actively participated in expanding our development team through technical interviews.

I'm adaptable, collaborative, and eager to continue growing as a developer with the goal of becoming an exceptional Frontend Team Leader.

interestingFacts.fact:
Here you can listen to my Tango Ensemble latest album (I made this website with SvelteKit)
https://sud.ucielsola.me

challenges.description: Since joining Mercanis in May 2022, I've enjoyed the collaborative atmosphere and challenging work. I collaborate closely with the product team to develop software solutions that exceed expectations. I've played a key role in designing and implementing new features, applying my technical expertise to solve problems and enhance our product. This involvement has deepened my product knowledge and fostered innovative thinking.  I'm also proud to contribute to Mercanis' growth by participating in technical interviews, ensuring we maintain a team of highly skilled professionals.

Since joining Viset in October 2021, I've spearheaded frontend development for our mobile app as its sole frontend developer. I'm proud to maintain and continuously improve the user experience for our established base of 200+ daily users.  Beyond the app itself, I've proactively developed internal solutions like admin panels that streamline user and content management, boosting our team's efficiency. Overall, my experience at Viset has been highly rewarding as I witness the tangible impact of my work on both our app and our team's success.

details.name: SUD Tango - Music Player
details.description: Music player built with SvelteKit, using WEBAudio API.

institution.name: EF SET
institution.description: The EF SET is the world’s first completely free suite of online certifying language tests for learners of all levels, from novice to advanced. As part of EF Education First, we draw upon a 50-year legacy of academic excellence, having helped more than 20 million people across the world to successfully learn a language.

institution.name: ORT Argentina
institution.description: Systems analysis encompasses a structured process that includes requirements gathering, thorough analysis, system design, testing, implementation, and ongoing maintenance. It aims to optimize how a business or organization functions through technology.

manfredSpecificData.desiredJobDescription: I like challenges, and I don't care if they are a little about my actual possibilities if I now that I have a good team to fallback into when I need it.
manfredSpecificData.goodPractices:
Clean, maintainable code is the foundation of my work. I use consistent formatting, clear naming conventions, and modular components for readability. To stay competitive, I actively explore new technologies and tools.

Effective collaboration is key to my success. I proactively seek design feedback, provide thorough code reviews, and communicate clearly to keep projects on track.

Above all, I maintain a positive, problem-solving attitude. Challenges are opportunities to learn and improve!
